casebody.data:
IN RE KATHERINE H. In re James H. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 12, 2018

Ann C., self-represented, in support of the petition.

Benjamin Zivyon, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petition by the respondent mother for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn. App. 320, 192 A.3d 537 (2018), is denied.

D'AURIA, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
